title: 820-3332 backlight
message:
Looks like Backlight is enabled, but not boosting.
Check first if D9701 is not shorted A-K.
Also check R9708/9, Q9701 and their traces.

Do PRAM reset 2-3 times.
What's the voltage at U9701 pin 2?
Did you test with known good LCD?
Any history available?

title: 820-3332 backlight
message: macbook is working but still no backlight

title: 820-3332 backlight
message:
Check R9717-22 and all traces around U9701.
Resolder U9701 pins and surrounding components.
Just in case, change Q9701.
